## ErrorXAction type

Union type of all possible error actions. Includes predefined actions (NotifyAction, LogoutAction, RedirectAction) and CustomAction for application-specific actions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ErrorXAction = ErrorXActionNotify | ErrorXActionLogout | ErrorXActionRedirect | ErrorXActionCustom;
```
**References:** [ErrorXActionNotify](./error-x.errorxactionnotify.md)<!-- -->, [ErrorXActionLogout](./error-x.errorxactionlogout.md)<!-- -->, [ErrorXActionRedirect](./error-x.errorxactionredirect.md)<!-- -->, [ErrorXActionCustom](./error-x.errorxactioncustom.md)
